message: Let's make a fair deal, I'll take 60% and you'll get 40%. It's better than nothing!
I'm proposing a more balanced split.  Let's both get a decent share, and avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle... closer to my side
Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a fair share too.  We both lose value with every round we go through.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going below 56%. We both lose if we don't agree soon
This is my final offer.  We both get an equal share, or we risk getting nothing.  Time is running out, and the value of our money is dropping rapidly.
